entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Gander
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:43 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 08:20 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -9.5°C
Wind: NE 31 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas this afternoon. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
